artist: Editor: Ben Holtzman; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of human anatomy, with letterpress text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 88 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Sick: A Compilation Zine On Physical Illness
